steps.description: Capacity exceeded + grease assembly + upsize suggestion

assertions.name: detect_kitchen
assertions.actual: for the hotel kitchen exhaust ventilation project, a two-stage filtration system is required. the gdc-flex family provides the necessary gas/odor/voc removal via activated carbon adsorption. however, in kitchen environments, grease and oil are present in the airstream. lipids permanently coat activa

assertions.name: detect_kitchen
assertions.actual: for the rooftop kitchen exhaust at the hospital near the sea, the gdc-flex family is not suitable for this environment. the rail-mounted construction does not meet the leakage class and hygiene requirements for hospital environments. additionally, the zinc coating (c3) dissolves in chlorinated envir
